actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to allow emergency action to be taken under fishery management plans to ameliorate economic or social emergencies affecting United States fishermen and fish processors.

summary.text: Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act of 1976 to permit the Secretary of Commerce to take emergency action under fishery management plans to ameliorate economic or social emergencies affecting United States fishermen and fish processors.

titles.title: A bill to allow emergency action to be taken under fishery management plans to ameliorate economic or social emergencies affecting United States fishermen and fish processors.
